body:
Title basically explains it all. What is your favorite gamemode (any server, any gamemode) and what do you wish was added into Avicus? Have fun ^^



My own answer: I like skywars a lot, and also TDM like Nexus.

replies.body: Some guy made a thread about quidditch or whatever that harry potter thing is and it actually looked pretty neat

replies.body:
I want Elimination back but it probably would not get played ;-;

I'll never forget when more than one game of elim would be on at once, with at least 12 people per match, the feels
